videoSnippet.title: Anand Wins a Game Carlsen Lost 11 Years Ago | MVL vs Anand | Norway Championship 2018 | Round 7
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Check out agadmator's chess Channel Song here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ApkShmA65qg&t=3s

Maxime Vachier-Lagrave vs Viswanathan Anand
Altibox Norway (2018), rd 7, Jun-05 
Ruy Lopez, Open (C83)

1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5 a6 4. Ba4 Nf6 5. O-O Ne4 6. d4 b5 7. Bb3 d5 8. de5 Be6 9. c3 Be7 10. Nbd2 O-O 11. Re1 Nc5 12. Nd4 Nd4 13. cd4 Nd3 14. Re3 Nf4 15. Nf3 Bg4 16. h3 Bh5 17. Rc3 Ne6 18. g4 Bg6 19. Be3 a5 20. Bc2 Bb4 21. Rb3 f5 22. ef6 Bc2 23. Qc2 Qf6 24. Ne5 c5 25. Nd7 Qf7 26. Nf8 Rf8 27. Qf5 cd4 28. Qf7 Rf7 29. Rb4 ab4 30. Bd2 b3 31. ab3 Rf3 32. b4 Rd3 33. Re1 Kf7 34. Bc1 Rh3 35. Re5 Rd3 36. Kf1 Rd1 37. Re1 Re1 38. Ke1 g6 39. f4 Nd8 40. g5 Ke6
